subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Two months after being knocked out of the World Cup by a reckless foul, the Brazilian star Neymar was back on the field for a not-so-friendly friendly against Colombia.
snippet: Two months after being knocked out of the World Cup by a reckless foul, the Brazilian star Neymar was back on the field for a not-so-friendly friendly against Colombia.
